Articles.Content: Looks fantastic
Will this be compatible with Kerbalism?
One of my favourites KSP mods of all time! So happy to see it's going to be updated. Obrigado

It's not often that a review of the pack results in a new upper stage, but the new SLS products for munar missions benefit from a smaller and more flexible vehicle, and the J2-X motor gets a larger nozzle for higher <abbr title="Specific Impulse (rocketry) or Internet Service Provider">ISP</abbr> in vac.

![0c8090bd85.jpg](https://i.imgsafe.org/0c8090bd85.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2017-03-11T06:15:39Z" title="03/11/2017 06:15  AM" data-short="7 yr">March 11, 2017</time> by YANFRET**

So, I have a huge, delicate Realism Overhaul install that I keep from updating so mods on it don't break.

I wanted to make an SLS replica, and went to make the Orion capsule, and thought I'd have to do a whole bunch of work to make an accurate one in <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> by dredging up the old CMES mod and making it work in newer KSP.

But alas, not only is the mod still up to date, and it isn't updated past my install of KSP so it's compatible - which is amazing - but there's been a lot of awesome work done on making it <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> compatible!!!

Holy crap, man, I freaking love you! This is like, the singular best thing to happen to me this entire week. You have no idea how freaking happy this makes me - and I nearly lost it to see the LDSD (big inflatable hypersonic deccelerators) parts set up for <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>! So. Freaking. Awesome! All the love. Make a Patreon and I'll probably throw money at you. Though that might not be legal because this is a KSP mod, but also might be if it's not technically paying for it? I don't even know. Point is this is amazing and thank you for doing this!

![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif ":confused:")

Parts I'm most happy about:

1. Altair lander descent stages.

2. Deep space long-duration habitat modules

 2b. and their cupolas that look beautiful and aren't terribly oversized unlike the stock one

3. Hypersonic deccelerators to make big packages on Mars feasible

4. Orion MPCV

5. SLS. Though I am actually using a custom build for the Block I core, which according to [this](https://www.nasaspaceflight.com/2011/10/sls-trades-opening-four-rs-25s-core-stage/) will use 4 RS-25's, not 5, but will use the CMES core for block Ia and II. But the ICPS and EUS are freaking life-savers. Again, all the love. This may only be #5 but it's my current project (SLS replica of all the currently planned flights) so I'm pretty freaking happy about it.

Where's the add rep button? Does that just happen when I like one of your posts, or?...

Part models from a wide variety of authors have been licensed, and new original models made, then combined with all new textures, sizes and configurations, to create craft files depicting the proposed missions. This project is modeled at 75% real scale.** **♦ Recommend installing this pack into a clean KSP install for the first time.** **♦ Latest version of Raster Prop Monitor needed for IVA function. Link included in download.** **♦ Copy everything in provided GameData to your GameData** **♦ Copy VAB folder to Ships** **♦ Copy Subassemblies to your save (optional)** **♦ Please remove any previous version files before installing!** ![5d7e61fc64.jpg](https://i.imgsafe.org/5d7e61fc64.jpg) ![5d7c8bfa2e.jpg](https://i.imgsafe.org/5d7c8bfa2e.jpg) **Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems includes products licensed from the following authors:** **Winston & Kickasskyle - KW Rocketry** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/) **Alexustas - A.L.C.O.R. Soooo cool!!! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

I was supposed to put new flooring down in the spare room because my wife told me so....

Now I have the perfect reason to skip that and fly to Duna in style today!  Thanks Chaka, you saved my weekend!
If your wife is any thing like mine you will be in big ass trouble then ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

So this IS <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> compatible! 1+ download.

Fire

Edit: Or is it? Confused. Will give it a try tomorrow.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-03-27T01:11:17Z" title="03/27/2017 01:11  AM" data-short="7 yr">March 27, 2017</time> by YANFRET**

What!? How did this go under my nose? I didn't know this was updated!

Ah, but sadly I cannot download it. With all of the mods that I have right now, I don't think that even my decently beefy PC (16gb ram, GTX720 graphics card) could handle it. I might be able to sacrifice a few mods for this (No more pretty clouds...) considering how amazing it is. 

Great work keeping this mod up-to-date.

these are absolutly amazing, just wish they had <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr> Life support ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
